title: WHAT HAPPENED!?
body: I was playing a game of LoL with my two friends. about 10-15 mins into the game we all hit a perfect 500 ping and clients disconnected. when we tried to reconnect we were all told that we had firewall problems. this cant be true as we had been playing for the last four hours. when we got our friend to try spectate he said that none of us were even listed as in-game. when he checked our match history we didnt even see the game listed as a leave. the game wasn't listed AT ALL. RITO plz we need your help. without LoL i will cry and be forced back to DotA {{item:3070}}

replies.body: What happens when you try to login? What OS and ISP are you with?
